Pre-Game Insights: South Africa are going to be the favourites going into their upcoming match in the ODI World Cup 2023 against Bangladesh, owing to the recent run of results for both the teams in the quadrennial spectacle.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch for the first match of the ODI World Cup 2023 at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai provided South Africa the opportunity to put a massive first innings score of 399 on the board against England.
The average first-innings score at this venue in ODI cricket is 251, which is expected to be breached when South Africa take on Bangladesh.
